title: The Biggest Question For The Bills
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss what the biggest question about the Bills this year is, Leonard Fournette responding to a report that he was overweight at mini-camp, Deshaun Watson reporting to training camp, and what Trevor Lawrences 2nd season will  look like. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Leonard Fournette responds to a report and what is the Bills' biggest question this season?
